definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
top of streets, bottom of alleys (idiom); everywhere in the city

sentences.english: It took only a short walk on a Beijing street to find other foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 我在北京街头仅走了一小段路来寻找其他的外国人。

sentences.english: Shop windows were shattered. Cars were smashed.
sentences.chinese: 商店玻璃破碎，汽车被砸毁，大量伤者躺在街头。

sentences.english: Buy stocks when there is bloodshed in the street.
sentences.chinese: 街头溅血，就是买股票的时机。

sentences.english: She’s also an avid street skateboarder.
sentences.chinese: 她还是一个热心的街头滑板爱好者。

sentences.english: Hitler's just a self-educated street agitator.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒无非是个自学出身的街头煽动家罢了。

sentences.english: The plan did not work and the emphasis switched from stage set to soapbox.
sentences.chinese: 计划无法发挥功效，重点就从舞台转变为街头演说台。

sentences.english: Late at night she walked alone in the street, appearing even more lonely and solitary.
sentences.chinese: 深夜，她一个人走在街头，越发显得身单影孤。

sentences.english: Tanks rumbled down the streets of Deraa, trying to seize the city back from protesters.
sentences.chinese: 坦克驶进德拉的街头，试图抓获回城的抗议者。

sentences.english: This art is becoming an active of street and fashion.
sentences.chinese: 这种艺术正在成为街头和时尚的艺术活动。

sentences.english: There were street clashes in Athens last week. Little wonder.
sentences.chinese: 上周雅典有街头冲突，小奇迹。

sentences.english: Street protests and union-led strikes have fizzled out.
sentences.chinese: 街头抗议和工会组织的罢工已经失败了。

sentences.english: In the street corner also presented the treatment sterile sterile adlet which blots out the sky.
sentences.chinese: 街头上也出现了铺天盖地的治疗不孕不育的小广告。

sentences.english: Also respect the space of other buskers.
sentences.chinese: 也不要侵占其他街头艺人的空间。

sentences.english: A car-bomb attack scene in one of the streets in Baghdad.
sentences.chinese: 巴格达街头一处汽车炸弹袭击现场。

sentences.english: Street-legal race cars are often as good-looking as they are fast.
sentences.chinese: 街头赛车为法律好看，因为他们往往是快速。

sentences.english: Rival supporters fought running battles on the streets of the capital Conakry.
sentences.chinese: 不同党派的支持者在首都科纳克里街头展开了争斗。

definition: top of streets, bottom of alleys (idiom); everywhere in the city
great streets and small alleys (idiom); everywhere in the city
to go onto the streets/to go shopping
